page.title: 11LEISURE TIME
page.content: My mum sometimes goes to Bingo.She is fond of knitting and sewing.She enjoys cooking and she likes hillwalking. * * * Dad plays darts on Mondays at the Club.He likes making wine.He goes to the Wine Circle to have competitions. Last year my dad won three prizes. * * * Shelley,my eldest sister cycles to Broughty Ferry and back.She types and listens to her tape recorder.She has won 30 rosettes at horse riding. * * * My brother enjoys swimming and swing ball.But he really enjoys tennis.He has a pop group with three of his friends.Its name is EyETALK. * * * ME,I like fishing and I have caught a perch.I won the chess trophy two years running at my last school.
